channel.title: Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Org-mode Hugo
item.description: 1. 安装 Hugo 参考: Quick Start 切换主题 clone 主题到 themes 下 修改 `config.toml`, `theme = “ananke”` 即可 参考: Step 3: Add a Theme git submodule add https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even Hugo -> GitHub Page 最终目录结构 org.wenyongzheng.com/ #全部文件 yongzhengw.github.io #Hugo project content/posts(ox-hugo export 放置生成的 markdown 文件，
